QuestData.Title: Mimiron's Sigil
QuestData.Description: Mimiron's a clever one. His entire abode is rigged with some sort of self-destruction mechanism.$B$BUnfortunately yer gonna have to race against it if ye want to get his sigil. Check the Archivum Console for more details if ye need them.
QuestData.LogDescription: Prospector Doren at the Ulduar Archivum wants you to obtain Mimiron's Sigil.$B$BFor more information on obtaining Mimiron's Sigil consult the Archivum Console.
QuestData.CompletionText: Were you able to obtain the sigil, $N?
QuestData.RewardText: I've got to hand it to you, $N. Our odds might not be the best, but I feel a lot better with you lending a hand.
